issue.title: [C++][CI] Fuzzit does not know about branch + commit hash
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5959](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5959). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reported [here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4504#issuecomment-509932673), fuzzit does not seem to retrieve the branch + commit hash, which is bad for tracking.
## AC
 \* Fix CI setup ([hint](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4504#issuecomment-510415931))
 \* Use `set -euxo pipefail` in [\`docker_build_and_fuzzit.sh`](<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/docker_build_and_fuzzit.sh>) to prevent this issue in the future
